author: Peden Doma Bhutia
title: IHCL Hits 380 Hotels in Fiscal 2025 Driven by Upscale and Midscale Surge
description: In a country with a booming middle-class like India, the move to upscale and midscale travel is a no-brainer. As consumers look for quality without a hefty price tag, brands that upgrade their midscale offerings are already reaping the benefits. -Peden Doma B…
content:
Taj-parent Indian Hotels Company Limited (IHCL) announced on Tuesday that it has increased its portfolio to 380 hotels through 100 new locations, including 74 signings and 26 openings.
